title: Ticket #40: VacateJob call needed in Birdbath
description: Johnson Koil Raj from condor-users (on 3 Dec 2008) had an issue when trying to get a VM job to return its output files with ON_EXIT_OR_EVICT via the WS interface to the Schedd. The WS interface only provides a Hold and Remove/Release operations. Vacate is notably missing.
